deploy_info.remark: 部署信息，system_unique填写部署机器的标识

Linux.name: python
commands:
cd /home/gsma
echo $PYTHONPATH
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$PWD
export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8
cd ./test/project1
nohup python2.7 monitor.py> output 2>&1 &
